translation.en: ♪ Chip, you're fantastic ♪ ♪ In everything you do ♪
translation.es: Chip, eres fantástica en todo lo que haces.

translation.en: Look! Super Space Squad action figures!
I'd love to tell you, but... ♪ It's a surprise! ♪
translation.es: Me encantaría decirles, ¡pero es una sorpresa!

translation.en: The Haberdashery Department is where you buy fabric
translation.es: En la mercería, se compran telas

translation.en: but we're not stopping here, Chip Dip!

translation.es: Es Corella, mi profesora de piano.

translation.en: Better hoodie up before she sees you, slidey mouse.
translation.es: A tu capuchita, antes de que te vea.

translation.en: I'm going to make it into a new jacket for my next music concert.
translation.es: Será una chaqueta para mi próximo concierto.

translation.en: Wow, you can play piano and make clothes!
translation.es: ¡Vaya! ¿Puedes tocar el piano y hacer ropa?

translation.en: Oh, lovely to see you, Corella, but we need to keep moving, puggy pups!
translation.es: Qué alegría verte, Corella, pero debemos irnos.

translation.en: Welcome to the Woofy Wedding Department.
translation.es: Esta es la tienda de bodas.

translation.en: We've got every possible outfit for your doggy big day!
translation.es: ¡Tenemos muchísimos atuendos para tu gran día!

translation.en: Is this where we're stopping, Momma? [older voice] It sure is, Pugsters!
translation.es: - ¿Nos detendremos aquí? - Claro que sí, puguis.

translation.en: Is this the dress you're going to wear when you marry Gordie?
translation.es: ¿Te pondrás este vestido para casarte con Gordie?

translation.en: It's not quite my style, Chipadoodle, but I have chosen my wedding outfit!
translation.es: Ese no es mi estilo, Chipi, pero ya elegí mi atuendo

translation.en: -[gasps] -Can we see it, Grandma? Puggy pleasey?
All three of you grandpups will have to wait till the wedding day.
translation.es: Mis tres perrinietos tendrán que esperar al día de la boda.

translation.en: I have a surprise for each of you.
I would like you all to be bridespups at my wedding to Gordie!
translation.es: Quiero que sean los cachorritos de honor en mi boda.

translation.en: I've been a bridespup twice already!
Bridespups do really important jobs at weddings.
translation.es: Somos muy importantes en las bodas.

translation.en: to let everyone know that the bride and groom are coming.
translation.es: para avisar que vendrán los novios.

translation.en: you can choose what to wear at the wedding!
translation.es: ¡pueden elegir qué ponerse en la boda!

translation.en: You mean I get to choose my wedding outfit all by myself?
translation.es: ¿Puedo elegir mi ropa para la boda yo sola?

translation.en: I want to wear a pretty dress!
I think I'd look cool wearing a jacket.
Can I wear a jumpsuit, Grandma?
but I'd like you all to choose outfits that are the same color.
translation.es: pero quiero que todos elijan atuendos del mismo color.

translation.en: Then, on the day, everyone will know that you are my special bridespups.
translation.es: Entonces, ese día, todos sabrán que son mis cachorros de honor.

translation.en: We can all choose the same color to wear, Grandma,
translation.es: Todos podemos elegir el mismo color.

translation.en: So, are you all happy wearing green, bridespups?
translation.es: ¿Les gusta estar de verde, cachorritos de honor?

translation.en: but the color is so fabby-waggy-doodah!
translation.es: Pero el color es tan fabulositástico.

translation.en: Don't worry, there are plenty of other colors to choose from.
translation.es: Calma. Hay muchos colores para elegir.
Elegimos un color para la ropa
que usaremos el día de la boda.
Elegimos un color para la ropa
que usaremos el día de la boda.

translation.en: [in unison] No way! No way! No way!
Oh, Potato, we can't all agree on a color for our bridespups' outfits.
translation.es: Potato, no podemos elegir el color de los atuendos.

translation.en: Choosing what to wear to Grandma's wedding is much harder than I thought it would be.
translation.es: Elegir la ropa para la boda es más difícil de lo que pensé.

translation.en: I wish we could find a color we all like.
translation.es: Quisiera encontrar un color para todos.

translation.en: You can't wander off by yourself in a department store.
translation.es: No puedes andar sola en una tienda.

translation.en: No, Spud! I am not wearing red!
translation.es: No, Spud. No voy a vestirme de rojo.
Y yo no voy a vestirme de verde.

translation.en: That's the color our rival soccer team wears.
Now, listen, pups, I know this is a really hard choice...
translation.es: Escuchen, sé que es una decisión difícil.

translation.en: So I think it would be better if Grandma chooses what color you wear.
translation.es: Creo que será mejor que Abu elija el color.

translation.en: I'll have a think, and we can come back another day.
translation.es: Lo pensaré y regresaremos otro día.

translation.en: Oh, Grandma, I'm sorry we couldn't agree on a color
translation.es: Abu… Perdón por no ponernos de acuerdo para tu gran día especial.
Perdón por no ponernos de acuerdo para tu gran día especial.

translation.en: Oh, my Chipadoodle, please don't worry.
translation.es: Mi Chipi, por favor, no te preocupes.

translation.en: You know you'll have to put that truck back in the toy department before we go.
translation.es: Debes devolver ese camión antes de que nos vayamos.

translation.en: You think maybe there's a color on here that we haven't tried yet?
translation.es: ¿Crees que hay un color que aún no probamos?

translation.en: That's a big idea for a little mouse.
translation.es: Es una gran idea para una ratoncita.

translation.en: [Spud] Sorry, Chipolata, but we've already tried all these colors.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero ya probamos estos colores.
- Me gusta… - El rojo. Ya sabemos.

translation.en: I like green, and Chip likes yellow.
translation.es: A mí, el verde, y a Chip, el amarillo.

translation.en: They look great all smooshed together in a rainbow.
translation.es: Se ven geniales juntos en un arcoíris.

translation.en: Your bridespups can still do this together.
Wanna help look for rainbow-colored outfits, Potato?
translation.es: ¿Me ayudas a buscar ropa de todos colores?

translation.en: You might be able to spot a rainbow-colored outfit from up there?
translation.es: Puedes ver ropa de todos colores desde ahí.

translation.en: Potato, remember you slid down the rainbow fabric just before we saw Corella?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas que te deslizaste por una tela antes de ver a Corella?

translation.en: Momma, please can we bridespups go to the ha-ba-dashery section?
translation.es: Mamá, por favor, ¿podemos ir al sector de "mercealegría"?

translation.en: Why do you want to go there, Chippy Dip?
Can Grandma and I come too?
[giggles] You are full of surprises, Chip!
I promise I won't look until you tell me I can.
translation.es: Prometo no mirar hasta que me digas que puedo.

translation.en: Rainbow-colored fabric for your bridespup outfits?
translation.es: ¿Tela de todos colores para sus atuendos?

translation.en: And we know who can sew them...
I nearly got a ride all the way to the toy department!
translation.es: Casi me llevan al sector de los juguetes.

translation.en: Thanks for your help today, Potato. -[beeping horn] -[giggling]
Do you think you can take the truck back to the toy section all by yourself?
translation.es: ¿Puedes llevar el camión a la sección de juguetes tú sola?

translation.en: Huh? This store has a wonderful café,
and I am not leaving until I've treated you all to an apple muffin.
translation.es: y no me iré hasta invitarles un panecillo de manzana.

translation.en: My way of saying thank you
for finding the perfect colors to wear to my wedding.
translation.es: por encontrar los colores perfectos para mi boda.

translation.en: I drew this for you with my new pens.
Hoodie up now we're in class, Potato.
translation.es: A tu capuchita para la clase.

translation.en: Puggy Panda Potato best friends forever!
translation.es: Pugui, Panda, Potato, amigos para siempre.

translation.en: It's... here at last, Happy Hoppers!
Everyone gather on the carpet, please!
You don't want to miss out on Fun Day fun?
You can stay secret in my pocket today.
translation.es: Hoy puedes quedarte en mi bolsillo.

translation.en: The bubbles are not for eating, Howie.
translation.es: Las burbujas no se comen, Howie.

translation.en: Whoops. Aw... Now, into pairs, please, everyone!
translation.es: Ahora pónganse en parejas, por favor.

translation.en: Ah, good morning, Mr. Diggerty. Nice hat.
translation.es: Buen día, Sr. Topín. Bonito sombrero.

translation.en: The gym's all set for fun.
We're going to have so much fun, Nico!
translation.es: Nos vamos a divertir mucho, Nico.

translation.en: Now, Happy Hoppers, before you bounce,
there are three rules that you need to follow.
translation.es: hay tres reglas que deben seguir.

translation.en: Bounce in the middle of your own trampoline, not at the edge,
translation.es: salta en el medio de tu cama, no en el borde.

translation.en: No bouncing unless a grown-up is watching.
translation.es: no saltes a menos que un adulto esté mirando.

translation.en: [together] Shoes off! Bounce in the middle!
translation.es: Sin zapatos. Saltar en el medio.

translation.en: Ready to bounce, Happy Hoppers? [all cheering] Yes! Yeah! Whoo-hoo!
Careful, Chip, you're too close to the edge!
[Diggerty] Now, Chip, remember what Ms. Gnash said,
translation.es: Recuerda lo que dijo la Sra. Castorina.

translation.en: you must bounce in the middle of your own trampoline.
translation.es: Debes saltar en medio de tu cama.

translation.en: It's lucky you landed on Nico's.
You might have landed on the edge and hurt yourself.
translation.es: Podías caer en el borde y lastimarte.

translation.en: And my favorite move... a seat drop!
translation.es: Y mi salto favorito, caer sentada.

translation.en: I want to do that, Potato.
I'll get the move right next time.
Trampoline time is over, Happy Hoppers!
translation.es: Se acabó el tiempo en las camas.

translation.en: Now, a special Fun Day snack time!
translation.es: Llegó el momento de una comida especial.

translation.en: I didn't get to do Gigglish's seat drop.
translation.es: No pude hacer el salto de Risitas.

translation.en: have made you your very own fun snacks!
Try my Mrs. Woolly's Wibbly Wobbly Pudding.
translation.es: Prueben el pudín gelatinoso y movedizo de la Sra. Lanas.

translation.en: Sample my Mrs. Whale super seaweed sushi rolls!
translation.es: ¡Prueben el sushi de algas de la Sra. Ballena!

translation.en: Fun Day is such a fun day, Chip. Uh-huh.
translation.es: - El Día de la Diversión es muy divertido. - Sí.

translation.en: I just wish I could have done a seat drop on the trampoline, Nico.
translation.es: Ojalá hubiera podido caer sentada en la cama elástica.

translation.en: Then it would be even more fun.
I'll teach you to do a seat drop, Chip!

translation.es: En mi cama elástica en casa.

translation.en: I will get to do a seat drop after all!
translation.es: Haré el salto de caer sentada.

translation.en: Before our next fun activity, Happy Hoppers,
there's just one thing to diggledy do...
translation.es: solo hay una topi cosa que hacer.

translation.en: Barry and Gigglish, collect the cups, please,
translation.es: Barry y Risitas, recojan los vasos.

translation.en: and Peter and Howie, clean the plates.
translation.es: Peter y Howie, limpien los platos.

translation.en: Chip and Nico, can you sweep up the crumbs, please?
translation.es: Chip y Nico, ¿pueden barrer las migajas?

translation.en: You'll need to get the dustpan and broom from the storage cupboard.
translation.es: La pala y la escoba están guardadas.

translation.en: Uh, Chip? We have to get the dustpan and broom.
translation.es: ¿Chip? Tenemos que buscar la pala y la escoba.

translation.en: But, Nico, if I could have just one more try
translation.es: Pero, Nico, si pudiera probar una vez más

translation.en: at doing Gigglish's seat drop on the trampoline,
translation.es: el salto de Risitas en la cama elástica,

translation.en: I know I could do it!
Chip, Gigglish said she'd teach you on her trampoline after school.
translation.es: Risitas dijo que te enseñaría en la cama de su casa.

translation.en: But I really want to do it now,
translation.es: Risitas dijo que te enseñaría en la cama de su casa. Quiero hacerlo hoy, el Día de la Diversión.
Quiero hacerlo hoy, el Día de la Diversión.

translation.en: No, Chip. You know the rule.
You can pretend to be a grown-up and watch me, Nico.
translation.es: Puedes fingir ser un adulto y mirarme.

translation.en: It'll be okay, Potato, I promise.
That's it, Chip. You tried the move.
What are you doing on the trampolines?
I think it's fine, but you two
translation.es: Bien. Creo que está bien. Pero debían buscar la pala y la escoba,

translation.en: should have been fetching the dustpan and broom,
translation.es: Pero debían buscar la pala y la escoba,

translation.en: What was our trampolining rule number three?
So, you knew the rule, but you didn't follow it,
translation.es: Conocían la regla y no la cumplieron.

translation.en: I have to tell Mr. Diggerty it wasn't Nico's fault.
translation.es: Debo decirle al Sr. Topín que no fue culpa de Nico.

translation.en: Mr. Diggerty, Nico didn't bounce on the trampoline.
translation.es: Sr. Topín, Nico no saltó en la cama elástica.

translation.en: He only climbed up to help me when I hurt my tail.
translation.es: Subió para ayudarme cuando me lastimé la cola.

translation.en: But I asked you both to get the dustpan and broom from the storage cupboard,
translation.es: Pero les pedí que trajeran la pala y la escoba,

translation.en: and you came here to the gym instead.
Therefore, you will help Ms. Gnash finish cleaning up the cafeteria
translation.es: Así que ayudarán a la Sra. Castorina a limpiar la cafetería

translation.en: while the rest of the Happy Hoppers enjoy the next fun activity of the day.
translation.es: mientras los demás disfrutan de la próxima actividad del día.

translation.en: My super Fun Day obstacle course!
translation.es: ¡Mi carrera de obstáculos del Día de la Diversión!

translation.en: Watching the others have fun isn't much fun, Potato.
translation.es: Ver a los demás divertirse no es muy divertido.

translation.en: This is all your fault, Chip.
You wanted to do Gigglish's seat drop, and you got us both into trouble.
translation.es: Querías hacer ese salto y nos metiste en problemas.

translation.en: Not eating your cake, Chip Dip?
Oh, Momma, Nico drew this picture just for me,
translation.es: Nico hizo este dibujo solo para mí,

translation.en: but now I don't know if he's my best friend anymore.
translation.es: pero ya no sé si es mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: I'm sure he's still your friend, Chip, but he's probably upset.
translation.es: Sigue siendo tu amigo, pero debe estar molesto.

translation.en: You broke a rule and got him into trouble.
It's so unlike you to break a rule, Chip.
Maybe tomorrow I could take you over to Nico's
translation.es: Mañana puedo llevarte a su casa

translation.en: so you could say sorry again and make up.
Can I give Nico my cake to say a proper puggy sorry?
translation.es: ¿Puedo darle mi pastel para pugui disculparme bien?

translation.en: That's a great idea, Chip. Do you want me to come with you?
translation.es: Es una gran idea. ¿Quieres que vaya contigo?

translation.en: I think I want to talk to Nico on my own.
translation.es: Creo que quiero hablar sola con él.

translation.en: I hope Nico wants to speak to me.
Oh, I'm sorry, Chip Pug, Nico went to bed early.
translation.es: Lo siento, Chip. Nico se durmió temprano.

translation.en: He was tired after all the bouncing, and the cleaning,
translation.es: Estaba cansado después de los saltos y la limpieza.

translation.en: and Nico has a big day tomorrow.
translation.es: Y le espera un gran día.

translation.en: His daddy is coming to visit.
I-- I brought him sorry cake.
Thank you, Chip. I'll make sure he gets it.
translation.es: Gracias, Chip. Yo se lo daré.

translation.en: In the morning, Momma, I'm gonna go to Nico's house again
translation.es: Mañana iré otra vez a la casa de Nico

translation.en: to talk to him and make up.
and in the meantime, you get a good night's sleep.
Do you think Nico and I will ever be best friends again, Potato?
translation.es: ¿Crees que volveremos a ser mejores amigos?

translation.en: Thanks for trying to cheer me up, Potato,
but I don't want to do trampolining again for a while.
translation.es: pero no quiero volver a una cama elástica.

translation.en: I just want to make up with Nico.
Will you help me do that tomorrow?
You're the best snuggly mouse in the whole world.
translation.es: Eres la mejor ratoncita mimosa del mundo.
